metadata.title: DEPRECATED: ELSA-2010-0291 -- gfs-kmod security, bug fix and enhancement update (moderate)
metadata.description:
[0.1.34-12] - Fixes a problem where improper locking commands can crash the system. - Resolves: rhbz#571298
[0.1.34-11] - Fixes 'Resource tempory unavailable' for EWOULDBLOCK message with flocks on gfs file - Resolves: rhbz#515717
[0.1.34-10] - Fixes 'Resource tempory unavailable' for EWOULDBLOCK message with flocks on gfs file - Resolves: rhbz#515717
[0.1.34-9] - Change gfs freeze/unfreeze to use new standard - Resolves: rhbz#487610
[0.1.34-8] - Fixes problem that produces this error message: fatal: assertion 'gfs_glock_is_locked_by_me(gl) && gfs_glock_is_held_excl(gl)' failed - Resolves: rhbz#471258
[0.1.34-7] - GFS kernel panic, suid + nfsd with posix ACLs enabled - Resolves: rhbz#513885
[0.1.34-5] - GFS: New mount option: -o errors=withdraw|panic - Resolves: rhbz#517145
